20101231171340.000|20101231171343.000|TR0|
20101231171343.000|20101231171346.000|TR0|Michelle has a garden.  She got the honey 
20101231171346.000|20101231171349.000|TR0|thing going.  And she got a whole bunch of

20101231174411.000|20101231174414.000|TR0|doesn't prevent you from getting a 
20101231174414.000|20101231174417.000|TR0|mortgage. That said, it's a good idea to 
20101231174417.000|20101231174420.000|TR0|wait probably at least two years. In the 
20101231174420.000|20101231174423.000|TR0|Chapter 13 bankruptcy, you have to come up 
20101231174423.000|20101231174426.000|TR0|with a payment plan and start rebuilding 
20101231174426.000|20101231174429.000|TR0|your credit and paying down your debts. 
20101231174429.000|20101231174432.000|TR0|That's the good thing. What kind of 
20101231174432.000|20101231174435.000|TR0|mortgage rate you're going to qualify for 
20101231174435.000|20101231174437.000|TR0|will depend on your credit. So two years 
20101231174437.000|20101231174440.000|TR0|or longer is probably a good time to wait.

20101231175337.000|20101231175340.000|TR0|
20101231175340.000|20101231175343.000|TR0|Let's take a look here. Iowa is becoming a 
20101231175343.000|20101231175346.000|TR0|"shall issue" permit state for weapons. If 
20101231175346.000|20101231175349.000|TR0|you now meet the requirements, you receive

20101231175354.000|20101231175357.000|TR0|was allowed to carry a weapon and who was

20101231175409.000|20101231175412.000|TR0|new laws in -- rather, Ohio, sorry.

20101231175418.000|20101231175421.000|TR0|prescription from one pharmacy to another,

20101231175438.000|20101231175441.000|TR0|Youth counseling without parental consent.

20101231175444.000|20101231175447.000|TR0|because of concerns about suicides and 
20101231175447.000|20101231175450.000|TR0|other troubles among gay youths. Some

20101231175453.000|20101231175456.000|TR0|who aren't ready to come out to their 
20101231175456.000|20101231175459.000|TR0|parents but need help. So there's this law

20101231175504.000|20101231175507.000|TR0|about how kids now between 12 and 17 can 
20101231175507.000|20101231175510.000|TR0|get counseling without parental consent.
20101231175510.000|20101231175513.000|TR0|
20101231175513.000|20101231175516.000|TR0|Finally, you know those cameras that 
20101231175516.000|20101231175519.000|TR0|sometimes catch you on the street. They're 
20101231175519.000|20101231175522.000|TR0|called red light cameras. They're usually 
20101231175522.000|20101231175525.000|TR0|right near a traffic light and they can 
20101231175525.000|20101231175528.000|TR0|catch you in various infractions, speeding 
20101231175528.000|20101231175531.000|TR0|or going through a red light. Well, in 
20101231175531.000|20101231175534.000|TR0|Illinois, it's going to be a lot tougher
